title: Senate Provides Model of Bipartisanship in Russia Probe (Audio)
itunes:title: Senate Provides Model of Bipartisanship in Russia Probe (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- William Banks, Director of the Institute for National Security and Counterterrorism at Syracuse University Law School, discusses the bipartisan Senate investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
